title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 66-2.5 - Obligation of local health officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 66-2.5 - Obligation of local health officer

State Regulations

If any student is unable to pay for the services of a private health practitioner, such student may present himself or herself to the health officer of the county in which such student resides, or the county in which the institution is located who shall then administer the immunization without charge. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
66-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
